comments.raw_text:
1. Have litmus open w/ focus and in a 2nd tab
1a) have the OS slept
2. get the update notification
3. update
4. after restart, look at the drop downs.

Expected: drop downs are fully populated
Actual: the drop downs are not populated

Note: 
1. not sure if the OS sleeping makes that much of a difference
2. web pages open prior to updating:
a) https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=673498 in it's own window
b) http://translate.google.com/#auto|fr|version in it's own window
c) https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/buglist.cgi?list_id=836572&short_desc=feedback&classification=Client%20Software&query_format=advanced&bug_status=UNCONFIRMED&bug_status=NEW&bug_status=ASSIGNED&bug_status=REOPENED&bug_status=RESOLVED&bug_status=VERIFIED&short_desc_type=allwordssubstr&product=Fennec
and 
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/buglist.cgi?list_id=836322&short_desc=truncat&classification=Client%20Software&query_format=advanced&bug_status=UNCONFIRMED&bug_status=NEW&bug_status=ASSIGNED&bug_status=REOPENED&bug_status=RESOLVED&bug_status=VERIFIED&short_desc_type=allwordssubstr&product=Fennec&product=Mozilla%20Localizations
in a separate window both in a tab
d) https://wiki.mozilla.org/QA/Fennec/Milestones/6.0/Beta_3/L10N_matrix#Sign_off_Table ; https://litmus.mozilla.org/manage_subgroups.cgi, https://litmus.mozilla.org/run_tests.cgi?test_run_id=301 in a window, https://litmus.mozilla.org/run_tests.cgi?test_run_id=301 is on focus, some options have been chanted to locale: ja platform: android OS: 2.2
3. addons and plugins will be attached
4. OS 10.6.7

comments.text:
Created attachment 547788
addons

1. Have litmus open w/ focus and in a 2nd tab
1a) have the OS slept
2. get the update notification
3. update
4. after restart, look at the drop downs.

Expected: drop downs are fully populated
Actual: the drop downs are not populated

Note: 
1. not sure if the OS sleeping makes that much of a difference
2. web pages open prior to updating:
a) https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=673498 in it's own window
b) http://translate.google.com/#auto|fr|version in it's own window
c) https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/buglist.cgi?list_id=836572&short_desc=feedback&classification=Client%20Software&query_format=advanced&bug_status=UNCONFIRMED&bug_status=NEW&bug_status=ASSIGNED&bug_status=REOPENED&bug_status=RESOLVED&bug_status=VERIFIED&short_desc_type=allwordssubstr&product=Fennec
and 
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/buglist.cgi?list_id=836322&short_desc=truncat&classification=Client%20Software&query_format=advanced&bug_status=UNCONFIRMED&bug_status=NEW&bug_status=ASSIGNED&bug_status=REOPENED&bug_status=RESOLVED&bug_status=VERIFIED&short_desc_type=allwordssubstr&product=Fennec&product=Mozilla%20Localizations
in a separate window both in a tab
d) https://wiki.mozilla.org/QA/Fennec/Milestones/6.0/Beta_3/L10N_matrix#Sign_off_Table ; https://litmus.mozilla.org/manage_subgroups.cgi, https://litmus.mozilla.org/run_tests.cgi?test_run_id=301 in a window, https://litmus.mozilla.org/run_tests.cgi?test_run_id=301 is on focus, some options have been chanted to locale: ja platform: android OS: 2.2
3. addons and plugins will be attached
4. OS 10.6.7
